verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let the lost man say,
"I am found in Him"
Let the poor man say,
"I am rich in Him"
Oh, let the river flow

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let the blind man say,
"I can see again"
Let the dead man say,
"I am born again"
Oh, let the river flow (2x)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Let the river flow, let the river flow
Holy Spirit come and move in power
Let the river flow (4x)
